She has been in this business for several years, which has given her sales experience that allows her to obtain the best income. Her business is in a strategic location which is good for business, because many people walk around the area. She is very well-known because her seafood is of the best quality and she offers accessible prices. Her service is also excellent.

Rosenda is an enterprising woman with many goals to achieve. She works every day to earn her daily bread, and she knows that with effort and dedication she will achieve success. In recent months, her demand has doubled, which gave her the drive to grow her small business. 

She needs to invest in supplies, but she does not have sufficient capital to do so. Therefore, she has applied for a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy wholesale seafood, etc. Rosenda Candelaria has creditworthiness and impeccable morals. She guarantees that she will be able to clear her debt while offering her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale seafood.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 31-year-old married man with two dependents living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He has been an agriculturalist by profession for two years. His qualification is what inspired him to join the service. His main clients are farmers.

Joseph has a dream of having a good residential house and buying more land for farming, despite limited finances. Joseph intends to use the loan to buy construction materials, such as sand and bricks.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as sand and bricks.

loans.name: Surgeon

texts.en: Surgeon used the previous loan to buy clothes to sell. He is a 32-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been operating a retail shop for 10 years. He started the business in order to supplement his farming activities. His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations and inflation. His personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent house, as they have a small mud-wattled dwelling. His business goal is buying land to grow more crops. Surgeon intends to use the money to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Elio Armando

texts.es: Elio de 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos menores de edad, que se dedican a estudiar. Elio es un padre de familia responsable y cariñoso quien desea lo mejor para sus hijos y que puedan contar con mejores oportunidades en la vida. Él trabaja muy duro sembrando maíz y maicillo en dos manzanas de terreno, el cual con mucho esfuerzo logra cultivar lo más que se pueda. Así mismo cría ganado vacuno para luego comercializarlo. Elio solicita un préstamo para comprar: piochas, palas, cumas, carretas, sacos, semillas para sembrar y otras herramientas más, así mismo parte del préstamo lo destinara a la compra de comida y vitaminas para las reses y así mejorar su calidad. Esto llena de mucho entusiasmo a Elio ya que podrá mejorar su negocio grandemente.
texts.en:
Elio, 40 years of age, lives with his wife and three children, who are minors and who are studying. Elio is a responsible and caring father, who wants the best for his children and for them to have better opportunities in life. 

He works very hard sowing corn and sorghum on two units of land, which with much effort he manages to grow as much as he can. Elio is applying for a loan to buy: pickaxes, shovels, machetes, carts, sacks, seeds to sow and other tools, and part of the loan will be destined to buy food and vitamins for the livestock and so improve their quality. This fills Elio with much enthusiasm as he will be able to greatly improve his business.

loans.use: to buy vitamins for his livestock.

loans.name: Juan Armando

texts.es: Juan de 59 años de edad habita junto a su familia, conformado por su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Es un hombre muy responsable que toda la vida lo que más le ha importado es el bienestar de sus hijos y su esposa. Siempre con deseos de superación Juan ha trabajado toda su vida como agricultor y se caracteriza por cultivar tener una de mejores cosechas de la zona ya que tiene frijol y maíz, de lo que recolecta vende cierta parte y gracias a Dios siempre le va bien porque tiene precioso accesibles al público y vende de mejor calidad. Juan desea comprar insumos agrícolas antes que se aproxime la próxima cosecha es por eso que solicita  INTEGRAL un préstamo para la comprar de semillas, abonos, herbicidas, insecticidas entre otros. Cuenta con un excelente referencias de pago cero atrasos pues es un hombre comprometido con sus responsabilidades. Agradece a Dios y a las personas de buen corazón que harán que sus ganas de seguir cultivando los mejores productos lleguen  a tiempo y así podrá seguir brandando una buena calidad de vida a él y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Juan is 59 years old. He lives with his family, made up of his wife and their children, in their own house. He is a very responsible man. All his life, the most important thing for him has been the well-being of his children and his wife. 

With the desire to overcome, Juan has worked as a farmer for his entire life. He is known for cultivating one of the best harvests in the area. He grows beans and corn, and he sells some of what he collects. Thanks to God, this always goes well because he offers his customers accessible prices and the best quality.

Juan would like to buy farm supplies before the next harvest begins. Therefore, he has applied for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, and insecticides, among others. He has excellent payment references with no delays, because he is a man who is committed to his responsibilities. 

He thanks God and the good-hearted people who will help him achieve his wish to continue cultivating the best products. He will then be able to continue giving a good quality of life to his children as well as himself.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, herbicides, and insecticides, among others.

loans.name: Polina

texts.en: Polina used the previous loan to buy drugs to sell. She is a 24-year-old married woman with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. For six years, she has had a drug shop business. Her hardships are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital to purchase stock. Her personal goals are educating her children and building a permanent house. Her business goals are buying land to grow crops and moving her business to a more permanent location. Polina is requesting money to buy drugs to sell.

loans.use: to buy drugs to sell.

loans.name: Gelva

texts.en: Gelva is a 35-year-old married man from the town of Kagadi, Uganda. He owns a restaurant in the same town and is also employed by EMESCO, a local saving and credit cooperation. He began his business due to lack of restaurants in the area and the need to earn extra income. He dreams of buying land for farming and constructing a house for a residence. Gelva intends to use the loan to buy utensils for his restaurant.

loans.use: to buy utensils for his restaurant.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en: Philip is a 47 year-old hard working married man with 10 children living in Kyenjojo-Uganda. He acquired his start-up capital from buying produce and selling maize and beans. He opened up a retail shop for general merchandise to help him look after his family and has been in business for three years.  His business is located along a busy street attracting many customers; however, he has a challenge of inadequate capital to meet his customers' demands.  He dreams of becoming a wholesaler and building a permanent home for his family.  Philip is requesting a loan to purchase sugar, soap, rice, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, soap, rice, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en: Johnson is a 49 year old married man with five children living in Masindi-Uganda.  He practices farming and owns a school to earn extra income.  He started the school in 2002 and has since reaped tangible benefits with increasing enrollment of students.  He hopes to educate his children up to the university level and expand his farming activities despite unpredictable weather changes, which would lead to low yields on the farm.  Johnson intends to use the loan to buy farm inputs such as seedlings.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seedlings.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es: Jose de 25 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es un hombre muy emprendedor, decidido a ser un gran padre, esposo e hijo. Siempre con deseos de superación ha trabajado para que en su hogar jamás haga falta el pan de cada día, siendo así esa persona responsable por su familia que le importa tener las mejores beneficios para los suyos. Jose cosecha maíz y frijol, esa es su fuente de ingresos y se siente orgulloso pues en su hogar es el único que trabaja y le brida lo mejor a su familia con sus dos manos y el sudor de su frente cada día. El desea cosecha más pues necesita mayores ingresos es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas ya que confía mucho en sus capacidades y que todo le ira bien con este préstamo. Espera seguir siendo ese hombre ejemplar y su familia se siga sintiendo orgullosa de el.
texts.en:
Jose is 25 years old. He lives with his wife and children in their own house. Thanks to God, he is a very enterprising man who is determined to be a good father, husband, and son. With the desire to overcome, he has worked to ensure that his home never lacks its daily bread. He is responsible for his family and wants the best for them. 

Jose harvests corn and beans, which makes up his source of income. He feels proud because he is the only person in his household who works, and he offers the best to his family every day using his own two hands and the sweat of his brow. He would like to harvest more because he needs a higher income. Therefore, he has applied for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy farm supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pesticides. 

He believes in his own capabilities and that everything will go well for him with this loan. He hopes to continue being a role model and making his family proud.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for sugar, polythene bags and local brew, for resale in his shop.

loans.name: Eric

texts.en: Eric used a previous loan to buy a printer.  He is a 31-year-old businessman living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He has a stationery shop, and with the proceeds he has been able to meet the basic needs of his family. Nevertheless, he is faced with challenges in his business such as price fluctuation, customers’ delinquencies and inadequate capital to purchase modern equipment.  His business goal is to hire employees to help grow his business and expand into new markets. His personal goal is to build a permanent house for residence.  Eric intends to use the loan to buy a laminating machine and other items like books.

loans.use: to buy a laminating machine and other items like books.

loans.name: Jemimah

texts.en:
Jemimah lives in Likoni area of Coast Province, Kenya. She is married. Jemimah owns a fish selling business, which she has been running for three years. She obtained the capital to start the business from manual jobs she performed in an export processing zone.
She learned about Milango through friends who invited her to the group and she joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenges are high transport costs and inflation. 
Jemimah is applying for a loan of 41,850 Kenya shillings to buy more fish for sale. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: To buy more fish for sale.

loans.name: Saul

texts.en: Saul used the previous loan to buy sugar, rice, cassava, flour, soap and books to sell.  He is a 30 year-old married man living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He has had his retail shop for over two years, which he got from agriculture after selling his cassava, beans and groundnuts from his garden. His main problems are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital. His personal goals are educating his children to a higher level and building a permanent home for them whereas his business goal is hiring employees to help expand his business. The purpose of the loan is to buy books, pens, pencils, sugar, cassava, flour, and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy books, pens, pencils, sugar, cassava, flour, and soap to sell.

loans.name: Nelson Francisco

texts.es: Nelson de 46 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus pequeños. Es un hombre muy trabajador ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por dar y brindar lo mejor para su familia, es honesto, sincero que su mayor sueño y anhelo es que sus hijos siempre viva en condiciones dignas y que en su hogar nunca haga falta el pan de cada día. Actualmente se dedica a la labor de ser jornalero es decir tiene una pequeña cosecha, siembra los principales granos básicos como frijol  y maíz vende cierta parte y lo otro lo deja para su familia, es así como Nelson se gana la vida honradamente. El siente la necesidad de mejorar un poco sus cosechas es por esa razón que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para poder así comprar insumos básicos como: Fertilizantes, Pesticidas, Insecticidas, semillas, Abonos entre otros. Él sabe que con eso mejoraran sus ventas y podrá seguirle brindando un buen bienestar a su familia como lo ha hecho hasta el día de hoy.
texts.en:
Nelson is 46 years old and lives with his wife and young children. He is a very hardworking man who has always been known for giving the best to his family. He is honest and sincere. His greatest dream and wish is that his children always live in decent conditions and that they never lack their daily bread in their home. 

He makes a living as a daily farm laborer. He has a small harvest and plants basic grains such as beans and corn. He sells some of the crops and gives some to his family. In this way, Nelson makes an honest living.

He feels the need to improve his crops, which is why he is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy basic supplies such as fertilizer, pesticides, insecticides, seeds, and manure, among others. He knows that this will improve his sales so that he can continue to provide a good well-being for his family, as he always has.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, seeds, and manure, among others.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel used the previous loan to buy mobile money cards for the business.

He is a 36-year-old businessman. He is married, has three children, and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He deals in mobile transfer money services, and the business is very lucrative. He deals with a challenge of a poor network that, at some times, allows few or no transactions. His dream is to use the services of all five telecom companies, so as to spread the risks. His goals are to be the biggest supplier of mobile money transfer services in the area, and to own a printing company.

He has now diversified his business into T-shirt sales. Samuel intends to use the loan to buy T-shirts to sell.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts to sell.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María Francisca vive junto a sus tres hijos en casa propia,  ella posee una venta de lácteos, queso, crema, requesón, entre otros además para complementar los gastos del hogar vende leña de calidad, ya lleva varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite mantener la calidad en su labor, la ubicación de su negocio es muy estratégica sus más grandes compradores son los vecinos, es mucha su clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer  activa siempre está dispuesta a trabajar, quiere alcanzar sus sueños y no descansara hasta lograrlo; su más grande sueño es hacer crecer su negocio  quiere invertir en insumos pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lácteos por mayor, leña etc. María Francisca es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que pagara el financiamiento y a la vez confía en que su familia tendrá una mejor vida.
texts.en:
María Francisca lives with her three children in her own home. She sells dairy products such as cheese, cream, and cottage cheese, among others. She also sells good-quality firewood to help with her home expenses. 

She has been in this business for several years, and her experience has been very valuable. This allows her to maintain quality in her work. The location of her business is very strategic, and her main customers are her neighbors. She has a large clientele because people know that everything she sells is of good quality at accessible prices. Her service is also excellent. 

María is an active woman who is always ready to work. She wants to achieve her dreams and she will not rest until she does so. Her greatest dream is to grow her business. She wants to invest in supplies, but she does not have sufficient capital to do so. Therefore, she has applied for a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy wholesale dairy products, firewood, etc.

María Francisca is very responsible and she has good payment references. She guarantees that she will pay back this loan and she is also confident that her family will have a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale dairy products and firewood.

loans.name: Everest

texts.en:
Everest, a 45-year-old married father of 11 children, lives in the town of Kagadi, Uganda where he makes bricks. He began this business to earn a living.

Everest intends to use the loan to buy a water pump to help in brick-laying. He dreams of constructing a house in the future and educating his children to attain degrees as minimum qualifications.

loans.use: to buy a water pump to help in brick-laying.

loans.name: Antonin

texts.en: Antonin is a 57-year-old married man who is a father to 8 children and lives in the town of Kagadi Uganda. He makes ropes, and his main customers are cattle and goat keepers. He dreams of buying land to construct a house and educating his eight children up to the University level. Antonin is requesting a loan to buy nets for rope making.

loans.use: to buy nets for rope making.

loans.name: Baluku

texts.en: Baluku used the loan to buy general merchandise to sell. He is a forty-two-year-old gentleman who has been running a retail shop for a period of two years. He started as a fishmonger and then got money to start a retail shop. Having inadequate funds is affecting his business since customers have different tastes and demands. He has personal goals of building a permanent house and expanding his business to new markets. Baluku intends to use the loan to buy sugar and salt to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar and salt to sell

loans.name: Rahma

texts.en:
Rahma lives in the Likoni area of Coast Province, Kenya. She is a married mother of one child. Rahma owns a grocery stall selling business which has been running for one year. She obtained the capital to start the business from employment as a teacher at a nearby school.
She learned about Milango through friends who invited her to the group and she joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenges are high transport costs and inflation. 
Rahma is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenya shillings to buy groceries like fruits and vegetables. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve on the living standard of her family and grow the business further.

loans.use: To buy groceries like fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Tukulakulane Womens Group

texts.en: Ellen is thirty six year old single woman with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She has a salon business which she has operated for ten years. She hopes to buy a plot and build a permanent house on it for commercial purposes.  Her main challenge is lack of enough capital to meet her plans while her dreams are to own a modern salon. The purpose of the loan is to buy more products such as synthetic hair and oils for the saloon. She is a member of the above mentioned group where each one guarantees the other in accessing a loan. Ellen is strategically seated in the first row alone for purposes of identification.

loans.use: to buy more products for the saloon.

loans.name: Shraf

texts.en: Shraf is a 29 year-old married man and has three children who live together in Haja, Yemen. He has a mill ("tahoun") and has been involved in this business for three years. He is an incredibly hard working man and as a result has a lot of experience. In addition, this is the main source of his income. On the other hand, through lots of effort, he has managed to grind his customer`s grains, i.e., he provides them with a service to put food on their tables. Recently, he says that the main challenge to his business is a seasonal problem: during the dry season this type of product is very expensive. So, He took out a youth loan of 500,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase grains for his business and sells them at a cheaper price for his customers. He hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow him to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase grains for his business and sell them at a cheaper price for his customers.

loans.name: Uyen

texts.en: Uyen would like to take a further loan to buy more food and ingredients to make food to sell from her stall. Uyen's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food and ingredients to make food to sell from her stall.

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Oanh is 38 years old and lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She earns a living by making soybean products and selling the soybean products from her stall to people in her community.

Oanh would like a loan to purchase a larger quantity of soybeans at competitive prices to increase her production of soybean products and increase the turnover of her business. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties.

loans.use: To buy soybeans to make food to sell from her stall.

loans.name: Eslam

texts.en: Eslam is a 21-year-old single guy. He is the eldest of five siblings. Eslam is a hardworking guy, who is also a university student. He tries his best to balance his time at school with his time at work so that he can learn the most from both. He is now applying for a loan to be able to pay for his next semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his next semester fees.

loans.name: Buthaina

texts.en: Buthaina is 18-year-old single lady. She has two sisters and one brother. Buthaina is a university student majoring in gymnastics. She wants to work as a gymnastic teacher or a trainer after graduation. She is applying for an educational loan to pay for the rest of the semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for the rest of the semester fees.

loans.name: Mujahed

texts.en: Mujahed is a 21-year-old man, who has seven siblings. He is also a university student majoring in Computer Science. Now Mujahed has applied for this educational loan to be able to pay for his upcoming semester registration fees.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester registration fees

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is a 25-year-old married man with a two-year-old child, and he lives in Kagadi, Uganda. He operates a produce business, which deals in maize, beans and groundnuts. He has been in business for a period of two years. The business is based in a rural area. He started it to enable him to earn a daily income to support his family. He says that he would like to build a permanent house for his family. Innocent intends to use the loan to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Philomina Group

texts.en:
This is a group made up of four women who sell wax print, vegetables and children's wear. They have been together for two years. They formed this group to enable them to access loans so that they can support their homes and take care of their children.

Philomina is a 26-year-old married lady and a mother of two children. She sells children's wear and has four years of working experience. This is her second loan with ID-Ghana. She repaid the previous loan successfully without any trouble. Now she needs an amount of GHS 500 to expand her business.

The group needs a total amount of GHS 1,800 to be able to buy goods and sell to customers.

loans.use: To buy more children's wear and sell to customers.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 36-year-old mother to two children, ages 12 and 3. She operates a salon in the town of Kagadi, Uganda. She was inspired to go into business, after having acquired skills from her aunt.

Caroline dreams of educating her children and building a permanent house for her residence. Her business plan is to own a beauty parlor. Caroline intends to use the loan to buy cosmetics for the salon.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for the salon.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en: Iman is a 45-year-old housewife. She is the mother of three boys and one girl. Iman has a home clothing sales business. She specializes in selling special women's dresses called Abayas. Now Iman is applying for a loan to buy more Abayas with different styles of embroidery on then.

loans.use: buy more Abayas with different styles of embroidery

loans.name: Zakiya

texts.en: Zakiya is a 30-year-old mother of two boys and one girl. She has a small store for selling different kinds of detergents. She is the only one who does that in their neighborhood. Therefore, she has a good number of customers. Now Zakiya wants to improve the quality of the detergents that she has, so she applied for this youth loan to buy new types of detergents.

loans.use: to buy new types of detergents to sell

loans.name: Xaverne

texts.en: Xaverne is a 40-year-old woman from Ngoma District in the Eastern Province of Rwanda. She is seeking a loan of $100 to purchase 21 rechargeable LED lights, which she will resell to people without electricity in his village. Every week or so, these customers will return to her to have their lights recharged for just $0.20.  She will reinvest the money she makes into buying more lights to earn more money for herself and her husband J Baptise (who also works on the business).

loans.use: To pay for 21 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households without electricity.

loans.name: Steven

texts.en: Steven is a 26-year-old farmer from the town of Kagadi, Uganda. He owns a produce store in the same town, where he sells groundnuts, coffee and maize. He began this business to enable him to meet the daily expenses of his family. He dreams of constructing a house and buying land for farming, in the future. Steven is requesting a loan to buy groundnuts, coffee and maize to resell.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, coffee and maize to resell in his produce store.

loans.name: Dienwari Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les neuf femmes du groupe DIENWARI  ont  en moyenne 46 ans et 7 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de KIMPARANA dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de parenté. Elles font l’achat et la vente de céréales,  de lait et de condiments alimentaires. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  2è  prêt solidaire. 
Madame FATOUMATA (debout au milieu sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de condiments dans le quartier Heremakono  et ses alentours. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 5 sacs d’oignons frais 3 cartons de cube maggi 2 sacs de sel de 25 kg chacun et 15 kg de poivre à la foire de San. Elle vend à domicile, dans son quartier,  au comptant, en détail et quelques fois à crédit à une clientèle composée essentiellement  de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame FATOUMATA espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 19500 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
All married and living in traditional extended households, the nine women of the "Dienwari" group are on average 46 years old with seven children. They all live in the town of Kimparana in the Ségou region (the fourth administrative region of Mali) and know each other through neighbourhood and family links. They run businesses buying and selling cereals, milk, and condiments.
With the goal of expanding their business, the group members joined Soro Yiriwaso and are on their second solidarity (group) loan.
Ms. Fatoumata (standing in the center in the photo) is a major seller of condiments in the Heremakono area and its surroundings.
She intends to use her loan to buy five bags of fresh onions, three cartons of Maggie cubes, two 25-kg bags of salt, and 15 kg of pepper at the market fair in San. She makes her sales at home and in her area, at retail in cash and sometimes on credit to a clientele composed mainly of women.
With this loan, Ms. Fatoumata hopes to realize an average monthly profit of 19,500 FCFA, which will be used to reinvest in her business and take care of the household expenses.

loans.use: To buy condiments.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en: Nadia is a 35-year-old, married woman, and a mother to four daughters and two sons. At her home, Nadia sells detergents, to help her husband in supporting their family and in improving their living conditions. She is applying for this loan to increase the quantity of inventory she has, and to add new variety, based on the various uses of the products.

loans.use: to increase the quantity and variety of detergents she has in inventory

loans.name: Eslam

texts.en: Eslam is a 20-year-old, single lady, who lives with her five siblings and their parents. After her graduation from high school, Eslam began working with her father, making yogurt and cheese from their goats’ milk. Now Eslam is applying for a Youth Loan, to buy some equipment that will increase their productivity, and to buy more goats.

loans.use: to buy some equipment that will increase her productivity, and to buy more goats

loans.name: Baraa

texts.en:
Baraa is a 20-year-old lady. She is the youngest of a sister and a brother. 

Baraa is a second-year university student majoring in finance and banking. She is applying for this loan to pay for her next semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester fees.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 20-year-old guy who has four younger siblings. 

He is a university student majoring in finance, and has applied for this loan to help him pay for his next semester fees to register.

loans.use: to pay for his next semester fees to register.

loans.name: Aissata

texts.fr: Madame Aissata, mariée et mère de 6 enfants s’active dans la vente de légumes  depuis  3 ans. C’est pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille, qu’elle s’est  tournée vers l’IMCEC afin d’obtenir un appui financier pour acheter des légumes et les revendre dans le marché local. C’est grâce aux bénéfices de son activité qu’elle réussi à satisfaire ses propres besoins. Si elle voit son fond augmenter, elle rêve d’avoir sa ferme et d’y cultiver plusieurs variétés de légumes et même de fruits.
texts.en: Madam Aissata, married and mother to 6 children, has been active in the sale of vegetables for 3 years. It's to improve the living conditions of her family, that she turned towards UIMCEC in order to obtain financial support to buy vegetables and resell them at the local market. It's thanks to the profits of her business that she manages to satisfy her own needs. If she sees her funds increase, she dreams of having a farm and farming several kinds of vegetables and even fruit there.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Amer

texts.en: Amer is a 20-year-old, single guy, who lives with his older sister. Amer is majoring in Hotel Management at the university. After school he goes to work, to make some money that covers his daily expenses, with a little left to save for schooling fees. He is applying for an educational loan that will help him pay, at once, his registration fees.

loans.use: to pay for his registration fees at the university, where he studies Hotel Management

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Her previous loan allowed Iman to increase her productivity and attract more customers using the new tools that she got. 

Iman is now applying for another loan to get more fabric and thread. She also wants to add selling goods, such as home appliances, but is still looking for a good distributor and a good price.

loans.use: to get more fabric and thread.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a conservative housewife. She has asked her son Husam to appear in the photo in her place. 

Amal is the mother of six children. One of them, Husam, is a university student majoring in archaeology. Amal is applying for this loan to help her son register for his next semester.

loans.use: to help her son register for his next semester.

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en:
Nisreen is a 33-year-old conservative woman, so she asked her husband to take her place in the photo. 

Nisreen and her husband work in selling used home appliances. She has applied for this loan in order to increase the quantity they have and expand their storage room.

loans.use: to expand their storage room.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 23-year-old single man. He has eight siblings. 

He is a university student studying to become a teacher. He is applying for this loan to pay the rest of his semester fees so he can register for the next one.

loans.use: to pay for his semester fees

loans.name: Mufeeda

texts.en:
Mufeeda is a 29-year-old single lady. She has three younger siblings whom she is supporting after their father passed away. 

Mufeeda has a small beauty salon that she has improved over the years. Now Mufeeda is applying for a youth loan to buy new equipment for the salon.

loans.use: to buy new equipment for the salon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an overhead tarp, stock for her stall and to assist with purchasing a security camera.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a Solar Home System for electricity generation, to replace a diesel-powered generator

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 46-year-old, conservative housewife. She asked her son to take her place in the photo.

Amal has seven sons and daughters. Her eldest is Mohammad, who Is shown in the photo. He is a 22-year-old university student, majoring in architecture. He is working at the same time, to cover his daily expenses, and to save up a little bit to help the family in paying his school fees. Now Amal is applying for an education loan, to support her son Mohammad by paying for his next semester fees with the loan funds.

loans.use: to support her son by paying for his next semester fees at university, where he studies architecture

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Amal is a 40-year-old lady, who started her business a few months ago and was able to make a good start. Amal sells makeup and cosmetic products, and accessories. She also has an office supplies section, for students. She is applying for this loan to enhance the shop's decoration and to add more accessories for resale.

loans.use: to add more accessories for sale and to improve the shop's decoration

loans.name: Zainat

texts.en:
Zainat is a 53-year-old married woman with a son and a daughter. She works in a private company, while her husband works in his medium-sized goods market, selling food and cleaning products. 

Zainat is applying for a loan to help her husband increase the quantity of food products in the store and increase his profits.

loans.use: increase the quantity of food products in the store

loans.name: Sameeha

texts.en:
Sameeha is a 47-year-old conservative woman. Her son appears in the photo instead of her.

Sameeha, a housewife, looks after her six sons and daughters while her husband works as a driver to support his family. 

Her son Hamza is a fourth-year student who is studying hard to get into his field after graduation and to help support the family and gain field experience. 

Sameeha is applying for an educational loan to help her son pay his fees for next semester.

loans.use: to help her son pay for his fees for next semester.

loans.name: Diba

texts.en:
Diba engages in clothing sales in her at-home store, through a booth at the open-air market (souk), and by making deliveries to customers with the help of her family. With many of her customers, she sells items by order. For others, she provides an inventory with a range of popular choices. The fact that Diba has diversified how she meets her customers' needs, helps her to maintain ongoing business growth and hope for a decent income.

Diba needed this loan to assist her with paying for renovations in her at-home store, and with buying more stock. Diba wants to continue and see her business do well. She wants to help her children and nieces with their studies and with establishing their own homes.

loans.use: To pay for renovations in her at-home store, and to buy more stock

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 21-year-old single man.  He sells food products such as macaroni, croups, sugar, tea, candies and dried fruits in his shop.  Ibrahim has two years of experience in this field, which makes him considered a knowledgeable and skilled person.

The food products he sells are very popular among people, and are in high demand. His monthly profit from selling foods is 170 AZN. He is a very successful entrepreneur because of his good location in the central bazaar of his home city. His father helps to purchase wholesale products. 

The profit he gains is not enough to reinvest in the business, and covering customers` demand is suffering for this reason. Being a main source of income, his profit is used for family needs. Ibrahim would like to increase his sales and invest additional capital. For this purpose, he applied for 1800 AZN. He will increase and diversify his foodstuffs. 

This will be his second loan, and he has a good credit history.

loans.use: to increase and diversify his foodstuffs.

loans.name: Dagoberto Antonio

texts.es: Dagoberto de 32 años de edad reside junto a su esposa, sus hijos, su hermana, sobrino y su madre. Es un hombre visionario que lo que a él más le ha importado en la vida es dar lo mejor para sus familia y que estos se lo agradezcan el día de mañana. Es muy trabajador  y actualmente posee una pequeña cosecha donde cultiva arroz, frijol, maíz y ademas de tomate y pepino. Buscando el bienestar de sus hijos Dagoberto desea ampliar más su cosechas, mejorarlas y que siempre sean las preferidas por los clientes  es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL  para solicitar un crédito para la compra de insumos básicos como: fertilizantes, pesticidas, semillas, abonos u otros, ademas de preparar el terreno donde cultivara. siempre buscando lo mejor para su familia espera contar con la ayuda necesaria y así seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Dagoberto, aged 32, lives with his wife, his children, his sister, nephew and his mother. He is a visionary man and the most important thing for him in life is to give the best to his family, and that they are grateful to him in the future. He is very hardworking and currently he has a small plot where he grows rice, beans and corn as well as tomato and cucumber. 

Seeking the wellbeing of his children, Dagoberto wishes to increase his harvests, to improve them and for them always to be his customers' favourites. This is why he approached INTEGRAL to apply for a loan to buy basic supplies like: fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, compost, and other things, as well as to prepare the land he will cultivate. Always seeking the best for his family, he hopes to have the necessary help and so to continue providing for his family and home.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies like: fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, compost, and other things, as well as to prepare the land he will cultivate.

loans.name: Sonia Isabel

texts.es: Sonia de 33 años de edad vive con su familia es una mujer muy conocida por sus vecinos por ser muy entregada a su familia es trabajadora, honesta, servicial su mayor sueño es seguirle brindando lo mejor su familia y que en su hogar nunca falte el pan de cada día. Con esfuerzo ha logrado obtener unas gallinas ponedoras de huevos y es así como se gana la vida honradamente vendiendo lo que sus gallinas le dan con son huevos. Sonia desea comprar insumos para que sus gallinas se mantenga bien, que no se le enferme ni que les pase nada malo es por eso que solicita  INTEGRAL  un préstamo para la compra de:  Vitaminas, Minerales, concentrado. Espera recibir el préstamo acordado y así poder comprar lo necesario y seguir siendo la mujer  ejemplar para su familia.
texts.en: Sonia is 33 years old and lives with her family. She is a women who is well-known by her neighbours for being very dedicated. Her family is hard-working, honest and helpful. Sonia's dream is to continue to support her family as best she can so that her home does not lack for bread each day. With effort she was able to obtain a few egg-laying hens and in this way earns a living honestly selling eggs. Sonia wishes to buy food for her hens so that they stay well, do not become sick, and so that nothing bad happens to them. For this reason she is asking Integral for a loan in order to buy vitamins, minerals and feed. She hopes to receive the agreed upon loan so she can buy what she needs to keep being a female role model for her family.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, minerals, and feed

loans.name: Nodicia

texts.es: Nodicia habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia. Ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz de esta forma brinda lo necesario a su familia.  Después de cultivar la cosecha pone  a la venta cierta parte de los granos básicos para poder suplir el resto de necesidades del hogar. Es muy conocida en la zona como una persona honrada, honesta, trabajadora y responsable. Cada día siente que las necesidades de su hogar son mayores por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL  de tal manera que por medio de la ayuda pueda comprar los insumos necesarios como: semillas, abonos, venenos para plagas entre otros. Para seguir cultivando los granos básicos que le permitan llevar el pan de cada día de su hogar.  Espera y confía en Dios todo poderoso que obtendrá resultados positivos y logrará  una abundante cosecha que le permita alcanzar su sueño de brindar a su querida familia mejores condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
Nodicia lives in her home on her property together with her family. She works growing corn, and so gives her family what they need. After growing the crops she puts a certain amount of the grains up for sale to be able to supply the rest of the necessities of the home. 

She is well known in the area as an honourable, honest, hardworking and responsible person. Every day she feels that the needs of her home are greater, which is why she has decided to apply to INTEGRAL for this loan, so that through this help she can buy the necessary supplies like: seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, among other things, in order to continue cultivating the staple grains that allow her to provide for her family's daily needs. 

She hopes and trusts in Almighty God that she will obtain positive results and will attain an abundant harvest which will let her achieve her dream of giving her beloved family better economic conditions

loans.use: to buy essential supplies like: seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, among other things.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es: Dominga vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, ella vende producto por catalogo, cremas, perfumes, cosméticos, entre otros, además para complementar los gastos del hogar vende antojitos típicos, el negocio se ubica en el lugar que califico como muy buena para sus actividades comerciales, ya tiene varios años de manejar las ventas y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia,  tiene ya mucha clientela fija pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, higiene, buenos precios pero sobre todo porque es el servicio más rápido; Dominga es una mujer emprendedora siempre dispuesta a superarse, quiere alcanzar el éxito por eso se esfuerza día con día, esta muy comprometida con su futuro, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda por lo que Dominga quiere aumentar la producción  y venta pero necesita de la compra de insumos y no posee el capital suficiente por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar Cremas, perfumes, cosméticos, etc. Dominga tiene buen record de pago y tiene una moral intachable, asegura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida como se la merece.
texts.en:
Dominga lives with her life partner and their children in their own home. She sells products through catalogs- creams, perfumes, and cosmetics, among others. Furthermore, to be able to pay home expenses, she sells typical snacks. The business is located in a place that she describes as very good for her commercial activities. Since she has managed sales for many years, she has gained a lot of experience. She already has many steady customers since people prefer her because of the quality of her products, cleanliness, and good prices, but above all because she provides the fastest service. 

Dominga is an entrepreneurial woman always willing to improve. She wants to reach success, and therefore she makes an effort day by day. She is very committed to her future. In the last few weeks, demand has increased, for which Dominga wants to increase production and sales. She needs to purchase the supplies but does not possess sufficient capital. Because of this, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that allows her to buy creams, perfumes, cosmetics, etc. Dominga has a good record of payment and has a high moral character. She pledges that she will be able to pay back the funding and at the same time give to her family the better quality of life that it deserves.

loans.use: to buy creams, perfumes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Kricia

texts.es: El calzado en material sintético y de cuero, el  principal  producto   que Kricia produce con su pequeña máquina, instalada en su domicilio; ella es una joven de 21 años de edad que desde sus 19 años, empezó su iniciativa empresarial de  la mano de su madre que quedó desempleada y entusiasmó a sus hijos para poner en práctica una microempresa. Su madre inició haciendo cursos en el SENA-Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje – centros de educación técnica y tecnológica, apoyado por estado Nacional, donde aprendió el arte de la marroquinería y posteriormente trasmitió a sus hijos el aprendizaje y desde ese momento Kricia no ha dejado de aprender hasta lograr equiparar a su madre. Ella con su negocio paga sus estudios universitarios en Química y Farmacia y simultáneamente trabaja en su taller. En sus tareas productivas Kricia trabaja artesanalmente, todas las operaciones del proceso: toma las medidas para tallar, dibuja el modelo, lo desmolda sobre cartulina, rectifica medidas, hace ajustes, saca el molde que corta sobre el material hila, hace el doblado de piezas y pega sobre el forro para finalmente hacer la costura y montaje de capellada en la cual termina el calzado sobre la planta. Su meta es mejorar las condiciones de su negocio gradualmente y terminar su carrera universitaria para emprender su propia farmacia generando ingresos con ambos negocios. En la actualidad está aplicando aun credikiva, con el cual comprará suelas, adornos, broches, para responder a un pedido pendiente en la isla de San Andrés, , debido a que también tiene un mercado que conoce su trabajo y necesita hacerlo crecer cada día mas, pues ultimanete fabrica bolsos que quiere impulsar en sumercado doméstico y en otros lugares del país.
texts.en:
Working on her sewing machine from home, Kricia decorates and personalizes shoes for her clients, including adding synthetic and leather soles to existing shoes. She is 21 years old, and began working in this trade when she was 19 alongside her mother and siblings. Her mother had been taking government sponsored courses at the SENA - National Learning Service - in technology and technical education, and she encouraged her children to start up small businesses. Kricia's mother taught her some of the leather-working techniques she had learned in her courses, and Kricia learned very quickly.

Kricia leverages the income she generates from her business to cover her university education in chemistry and pharmacology. When designing and making her shoes, Kricia makes sure her creativity and personal touch are present throughout the entire process: she takes a client’s foot measurements, draws out a model design, stretches and manipulates fabric over a cardboard shoe sole, makes corrections and adjustments to fabric and sizing, takes a mold for the sole, cuts out the sole from the desired material, folds, glues and sews key parts together, and finally mounts the upper portion of the shoe onto the desired sole.

Her goal is to improve and expand her business gradually, and to finish her university degree so that she can begin a career as a pharmacist and have two sources of income. Kricia plans to use the support from this loan to purchase shoe soles, accessories, material and brooches for responding to an order from a client on the island of San Andrés. Kricia enjoys a customer base of people who know her for her quality work, and she wants to expand on that base to increase her clientele and begin designing and selling purses and bags in local supermarkets and other locations in the country.

loans.use: to purchase shoe soles, accessories, brooches and other decorative items for responding to client orders.

loans.name: Jose Enrique

texts.es: José Enrique vive junto a sus padres y sus hermanos en casa propia. Él posee una ladrillera desde hace mucho tiempo y tiene mucha experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio está ubicado en una calle principal muy transitada, un lugar muy estratégico para las ventas, es muy conocido en la zona pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con producto de calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es excelente; José es un hombre dedicado a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan concretar su objetivo de llegar al éxito, desde hace algún tiempo la demanda en su negocio ha aumentado al doble y no quiere decepcionarlos por eso ha decidido aumentar la producción e invertir es así como le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar barro, cemento, saltex, herramienta etc. José Enrique tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
José Enrique lives with his parents and siblings in their own home, and he has operated a brick business for some time now. With lots of experience in manufacturing and selling bricks, he is able to get fair sale prices for his products. His business is located on a central, busy street, in an ideal location for attracting new clients and making sales. José is well known in the area for offering high quality work, first class service, and good products at very fair prices.

José is very dedicated to his work, and always puts forth his best effort. He is always looking for new opportunities to expand and grow his business. Recently, customer demand for José's products has doubled, and since he does not want to cut corners and disappoint his customers, he has decided to invest in an increase in overall production. José hopes this loan with INTEGRAL will be the right investment in and for his business, and he plans to use the support from this loan to purchase clay, cement, saltex, tools, and other input items for manufacturing bricks. José is a very responsible person, and promises to make all scheduled loan repayments on time. He hopes this loan will help him to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase clay, cement, saltex and tools for his brick manufacturing business.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Victor Es un hombre muy conocido por sus vecinos por ser un hombre muy entregado a su familia es trabajador, honesto, servicial su mayor sueño es seguirle brindando lo mejor su familia y que en su hogar nunca falte el pan de cada día. Con esfuerzo ha logrado obtener un ganado y tambien cultiva granos basicos como maiz y frijol y es así como se gana la vida honradamente vendiendo lo que sus Ganado de brinda. Victor desea comprar insumos para que su ganado se mantenga bien, que no se le enferme ni que les pase nada malo es por eso que solicita  INTEGRAL  un préstamo para la compra de:  Vitaminas, Minerales, Forraje, concentrado. Espera recibir el préstamo acordado y así poder comprar lo necesario y seguir siendo el hombre ejemplar para su familia.
texts.en:
Victor is a man who is very well-known by his neighbors for being a man who is very committed to his family.  He is hard-working, honest, and selfless.  His biggest dream is to continue giving his family the best and that his household never lacks for its daily bread.

With effort he has managed to get livestock.  He also grows basic crops like corn and beans.  This is how he honorably earns a living from his livestock.

Victor wishes to buy supplies to keep his livestock well so they do not get sick of have something bad happen to them.  That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  He will use the loan to buy vitamins, minerals, fodder, and concentrated feed.  He hopes to receive the loan in order to buy what is needed and to continue being an exemplary man for his family.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, minerals, fodder, and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Patricia Guadalupe

texts.es: Patricia Guadalupe vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia; ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa para damas y caballeros, tiene en variedad camisas, pantalones, vestidos, blusas, entre otros,  tiene muchos años de poseer el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas lo cual le permite obtener muy buenas ganancias, ella tiene su venta en un lugar muy estratégico muy concurrido de personas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precio accesible y con un servicio excelente; Patricia es una mujer comprometida con sus sueños, dedicada a su labor, todos los días se levanta con la disposición de luchar por un futuro mas  prospero pues sabe que solo así tendrá éxito; en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda  y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Patricia Guadalupe tiene buenas referencias y es muy responsable, se siente muy agradecida con el apoyo y  asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Patricia Guadalupe lives with her life partner and her son in her own home. She buys and sells clothing for men and women. She has a variety of shirts, pants, dresses, blouses, and other styles. She has run this business for many years and she has gained a lot of experience in sales which helps her to earn more. Her sales site is located in a strategic part of the city, where many people come through. She has gained many clients because they prefer her for her higher quality items and affordability as well as her excellent service. Patricia is dedicated to achieving her dreams and dedicated to her work; she gets up every day with the attitude of being ready to fight for a better tomorrow because she knows that this is the only way she will achieve success. In recent weeks, demand has increased and she wants to take advantage of this situation to make a new investment in her business. This is why she is asking for a loan with INTEGRAL that will help her purchase more wholesale clothing. Patricia Guadalupe has good references and is a responsible person, she is grateful for the support she is receiving and assures us that she will be able to settle her debt while at the same time being able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: purchase wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Evelio Vasquez

texts.es: Evelio de 53 años de edad vive junto a su familia. Es un hombre con grandes aspiraciones y deseos de superación, siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un buen trabajador y todo hay sido inspirado por su familia. Siempre el su hogar jamás falta el pan de cada día y esto lo hace un gran hombre, padre ejemplar y buen esposo. Evelio se dedica al cultivo de Hortalizas es decir Tomate , guisquil ayote y pepino en tiempos. Es un hombre que siempre ha trabajado y no descansa con sus cosechas  es por eso que se acerca a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así comprar insumos necesarios como: Pesticidas, Insecticidas, Abonos para que sus cosechas no presenten problemas y él los pueda vender de manera que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día y sobre todo que siga siendo el hombre ejemplar que es en su casa.
texts.en:
Evelio is 53 years old, and lives with his family. He is a man of big dreams and vision, and is known for being a hard-working man who is dedicated to his family. Evelio works very hard to provide for his family, and always strives to be a good husband and father. He makes a living as a tomato, squash and cucumber farmer. 

Evelio works year round and does not take time off after harvests. With the support from this loan, he plans to purchase important input items for tending his crops and land, including: pesticides, insecticides and manure. He hopes that these products will protect and strengthen his crops in the coming growing season, and will allow him to sell his vegetables for a good price so that he can continue providing for his family.

loans.use: to purchase input items for his farming operation, including pesticides, insecticides and manure.

loans.name: Carlos De Jesus

texts.es: Carlos de Jesús, habita en casa de su  propiedad junto con su esposa e hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de los principales granos básicos como maíz y frijoles. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad toda su vida por lo que tiene ya mucha experiencia. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme amabilidad con las demás personas. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra se aproxima y ya que esta es su única fuente de ingresos, ha tomado la decisión de comenzar a prepararse para la llegada de esta y es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Carlos confía en que  su cosecha sea abundante ya que es la única forma que conoce y hace para lograr tener acceso a una fuente de ingresos y darle el sustento y una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Carlos de Jesús lives in his own house on his property with his wife and children. He works in agriculture, planting basic crops like corn and beans. He has been involved in this activity his whole life, and so, he has a lot of experience. He is a hard worker, responsible and is well known in his area for his friendliness with others. Because the planting season is approaching, and this is his only income source, he has made the decision to begin to prepare and would like to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchasing of seeds, fertilizers and insecticides etc. Carlos tells us that his harvests are abundant and that this is the way he knows how to access an income source and to sustain his family while offering them a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizers, insecticides etc.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de Jesus vive junto con su Familia.  Él se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol, después de sacar la cosecha  comercializa una parte de su cultivo para poder suplir las necesidades de su hogar que cada día son mayores. Él es  trabajador, emprendedor cuya principal motivación es darle el sustento y una buena calidad de vida a su familia con el fruto de su trabajo. Ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado formar su hogar, ya que esta es su principal fuente de ingresos tomo la decisión de acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere asegurar el terreno para su próxima siembra. Este préstamo le servirá  para invertir en la comprar de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos, etc. para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Manuel de Jesus lives with his family.  He works in agriculture growing basic grains such as corn and beans.  After harvesting his crops he sells some of them to provide for his family's needs, which increase every day.  He is a hardworking entrepreneur whose main motivation is to support his family and provide them with a good quality of life with the fruits of his labor.  He has worked in agriculture all of his life and that is how he has been able to set up his home, as this is his primary source of income.  He decided to approach INTEGRAL to request a loan because the time to begin planting is coming and he wants to ensure the land is ready for the next crop.  This loan will be used to purchase agricultural products such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizer, etc.  to begin planning as soon as possible. He is confident that he will obtain an abundant crop which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural products such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Berta Cruz

texts.es: Berta Cruz vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de alboroto, quesadillas y ricos tamales, tiene varios años con el pequeño negocio y eso le ha regalado preciada experiencia que le permite obtener el máximo de ganancias, es muy conocida en la zona pues elabora su producto con un sabor inigualable, comercia desde su hogar y de forma ambulante ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad a precios accesibles y con un servicio excelente; Berta  es una mujer dedicada a su labor, siempre dispuesta a aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa grandes logros pero también se esfuerza por cumplirlos, quiere acrecentar el negocio, invertir en insumos para aumentar la producción pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maicillo, maíz, carne, verduras, etc. Berta Cruz tiene muy buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, esta muy contenta con el apoyo y agradece de antemano, confía en que saldara el financiamiento y a la vez llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Berta Cruz lives with her life partner in a home they own.  She sells popcorn, quesadillas, and delicious tamales.  She has had a small business for many years which has provided her with valuable experience so she can make the highest earnings.  She is well known in the area because her product tastes like no other.  She sells from her home and in the streets.  She has many customers because people know her products are quality at reasonable prices, and with excellent service.  Berta is a woman who is dedicated to her work.  She is always open to taking advantage of opportunities that present themselves.  She dreams of great successes but also works hard to achieve them.  She wants to grow her business and invest in ingredients to increase her production, but she needs help in the form of capital.  This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to purchase sorghum, corn, meat, vegetables, etc.  Berta Cruz has very good credit references and is responsible.  She is very happy with the support and thankful in advance.  She is confident that she will pay off the loan and at the same time bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to purchase sorghum, corn, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es: José Eliseo se dedica  al cultivo y comercio de maíz. Vive en su casa propia junto a su familia. Cada año repite esta actividad y se esfuerza para que sea mejor que el año anterior, es así como se gana la vida y es importante mencionar que es su principal fuente de ingresos. José se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y muy responsable. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él y confían en el producto que comercializa. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a INTEGRAL, para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar los principales insumos agrícolas semillas, insecticidas, abonos, etc. Y continuar cultivando la tierra para cosechar los principales  granos básicos que le permiten llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Confía en que este año será mejor y podrá así darle a su familia un mejor futuro
texts.en:
José Eliseo works as a corn farmer, and lives with his family in their own home. He works hard to make each growing season and harvest better than the previous one, and his farming operation is his primary source of income. José is well known in his community for being a hard-working, honorable and responsible man, and everyone knows that he farms and sells high quality corn.

With the support from this loan, José plans to purchase agricultural input items for his farming operation, including seeds, insecticides and manure, etc. He hopes that this investment will help him to strengthen and increase his upcoming harvest, providing a better future for his family.

loans.use: to purchase input items for his farming operation, including: seeds, insecticides, manure, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn seed, insecticide, herbicide, and tools.
